pli-tv-bi-vb-pc3:1.1: Tena samayena buddho bhagavā sāvatthiyaṃ viharati jetavane anāthapiṇḍikassa ārāme.
pli-tv-bi-vb-pc3:1.2: Tena kho pana samayena dve bhikkhuniyo anabhiratiyā pīḷitā ovarakaṃ pavisitvā talaghātakaṃ karonti.
pli-tv-bi-vb-pc3:1.3: Bhikkhuniyo tena saddena upadhāvitvā tā bhikkhuniyo etadavocuṃ—
pli-tv-bi-vb-pc3:1.5: “Na mayaṃ, ayye, purisena saddhiṃ sampadussāmā”ti bhikkhunīnaṃ etamatthaṃ ārocesuṃ.
pli-tv-bi-vb-pc3:1.6: Yā tā bhikkhuniyo appicchā …pe… tā ujjhāyanti khiyyanti vipācenti—
pli-tv-bi-vb-pc3:1.11: kathañhi nāma, bhikkhave, bhikkhuniyo talaghātakaṃ karissanti.
pli-tv-bi-vb-pc3:1.13: evañca pana, bhikkhave, bhikkhuniyo imaṃ sikkhāpadaṃ uddisantu—
pli-tv-bi-vb-pc3:2.2: samphassaṃ sādiyantī antamaso uppalapattenapi muttakaraṇe pahāraṃ deti, āpatti pācittiyassa.
